feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.5°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
